short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up a 24-digit service request in Ariba Connect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides you with the option to quickly "jump" to a service request on SAP Ariba Connect. Input any text containing the 24-digit service request number and you will be redirected to that service request on Connect.

May be used in two methods: (1) click the extension button and input your text in the prompt or (2) use Chrome's built-in omnibox (commonly known as the address bar) - type the letter "c" hit space and input your text, then hit Enter, and voil√°.
